get.summary: Gets version

post.summary: Admin User, CSM user and S3 User login

get.summary: Get CSM user list: CSM user having permission manage and monitor can get CSM users list

post.summary: Create new CSM user: CSM user having permission manage can create new CSM user

get.summary: Get CSM user: CSM user having permission manage and monitor can get CSM user

patch.summary: Update CSM user credentials: CSM user having permission manage can update CSM user

parameters.name: edit csm user
parameters.description: Edit CSM user credentials. The 'current_password' property is required for users who change their own password. The superuser can skip this field for all other users.

delete.summary: Delete csm user: CSM user having permission manage can delete existing CSM user

get.summary: Get the User Permissions: Accessible to all the users
Get S3 Accounts: Accessible to CSM users with manage and monitor permissions and S3 account

post.summary: Create new S3 Account: Accessible to CSM users with manage permission and S3 account

patch.summary: Update S3 account password: Accessible to S3 account only

delete.summary: Delete S3 Account: Accessible to S3 account only

get.summary: Get S3 account access keys:  Accessible to S3 account only

post.summary: Create new S3 account access key:  Accessible to S3 account only

delete.summary: Delete S3 account access key: Accessible to S3 account only

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Specifies the S3 account access key

get.summary: Get the bucket list: Accessible to S3 account only

post.summary: Add bucket: Accessible to S3 account only

delete.summary: bucket policy delete: Accessible to S3 account only

get.summary: Get Bucket Policy: Accessible to S3 account only

put.summary: Edit Bucket Policy: Accessible to S3 account only

delete.summary: bucket  delete: Accessible to S3 account only

get.summary: Get IAM users list: Accessible to S3 account only

post.summary: Create new IAM user: Accessible to S3 account only

delete.summary: Delete IAM user: Accessible to S3 account only

get.summary: Get iam user access keys:  Accessible to S3 account only

post.summary: Create new iam user access key:  Accessible to S3 account only

delete.summary: Delete S3 account access key: Accessible to S3 account only

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Specifies the S3 account access key

get.summary: Gets Alerts: Accessible to CSM users having monitor and manage permissions

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies limit for results per page

patch.summary: Acknowledge Alerts: Accessible to CSM users having manage permission

get.summary: Get Alert: Accessible to CSM users having monitor and manage permissions

patch.summary: Edit Alert: Accessible to CSM users having manage permission and it will update the acknowledge flag

get.summary: Get alert history: Accessible to CSM users having monitor and manage permissions

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies limit for results per page

get.summary: Get alert history for specific alert: Accessible to CSM users having monitor and manage permissions
Get alert comments for specific alert: Accessible to CSM users having monitor and manage permissions

post.summary: Add comments to the Alert: Accessible to CSM users having manage permission

get.summary: Get Health Summary of the system: Accessible to CSM users having monitor and manage permissions
Get Health of nodes: Accessible to CSM users having monitor and manage permissions
Get Health of nodes with alerts: Accessible to CSM users having monitor and manage permissions
Get Health of resources with severity: Accessible to CSM users having monitor and manage permissions
